alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:44PM EDT until April 06 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located near Midway, and moving northeast at 30 mph. * Locations impacted include... Midway, Havana, Tallahassee, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Florence, Scotland, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Killearn Estates, Shady Rest, Tallahassee Mall, Hinson, Forest Meadows Park, Pisgah Church, Moncrief, Lake Iamonia, Concord and Orchard Pond. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Georgia.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
